decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, ES6, Replacement UDP Policy 4.1. | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, ES6, H33, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 5.5. | The extension permitted shall not be used or occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 12 Beauvais Terrace, Northolt, Middlesex, UB5 6JT.  REASON:	To ensure that the character of the area is preserved and a separate dwelling is not created, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, H11, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 5.6. | Notwithstanding any indications on the approved plans, details of car parking space for one car and pedestrian access in accordance with the standards adopted by the Local Planning Authority shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any works commence on site.  Such provision to be brought into use prior to the first occupation of any part of the development permitted and retained permanently.  REASON:  To ensure that there is adequate provision of car parking and pedestrians within the site, in accordance with Unitary Development Plan (UDP) Adopted Policies B1, B5, T50, T63, Replacement UDP Policies 4.1, 9.11, 9.12.
description: Single storey rear extension, single storey extension at front of house with other external alterations to front to suit use of garage as habitable room
